title: Understanding the Type of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, different types of analyses are used to achieve various objectives. Consider what the primary goal is when developing a new technique for measuring trace gases.

title: Focus on the Objective
text: Think about whether the objective is to quantify, identify, or improve the precision of measurements. Which category does this fall into?

title: Different Types of Analysis
text: Recall the types of analysis: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Which one involves developing new techniques?

title: Identifying the Analysis Type
text: Which type of analysis focuses on developing new methods or techniques to enhance measurement precision?
